channel.title: How do u put a server up?
channel.description: i dont know how to put a server up lol...im new at it

item.title: How do u put a server up?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Of course, you need a Source. After yuo have that Source, extract it to your Desktop and if you want to have Hamachi (not recommended) just get a Hamachi Server. But, if you want a No-IP (recommended) go to No-IP.com and get one then Port Forward through your Router and Run your Server with runserver.bat and viola! Server is up and running.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u put a server up?

item.title: How do u put a server up?
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

First, download one of the sources that are posted here

Now, you can either edit the source or run the source as-is.

If you want to edit it go here and follow one of the many tutorials…

Now, once you are satisfied… Open up the source of the server.

Now double click run-server.bat and it should say starting sourcenamehere on port 43594 or something like that.

If it says that you can now open Moparscape 3.2 if you do not already have it get it here

I hope I helped…

Read full topic
item.source: How do u put a server up?
